name: DreamEater! beta edition
description:
CONTROL OPTIONS FOR DESKTOP 
1. Movement: Arrows // Bomb: X // Switch: C // Shoot: Z //PlayStop: Space
1. Movement: WASD // Bomb: O // Switch: P // Shoot: I //PlayStop: Space

Follow the Dream Eater and the Magical Dreamers on their adventure!
Their mission is to protect people's dreams from menacing spirits, such as Fantasies and Nightmares. They will use all their strenght on this shoot 'em up action!
